          <title>
            <string language="en">Living and non-living things in soil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebende und nicht-lebende Sachen im Boden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Choses vivantes et non-vivantes dans le sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coisas vivas e non-vivendo no solo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cose viventi e non-viventi in terreno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πράγματα διαβίωσης και μη-διαβίωσης στο χώμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cosas vivas y no-que viven en suelo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The soil in the thimble contains about a million bacteria. Bacteria are living while the soil is not.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bacteria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">living things</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">non-living things</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">soil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thimble</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Boden in der Muffe enthält ungefähr Million 
Bakterium. Bakterium lebt, während der Boden nicht ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le sol dans le dé contient environ million de 
bactéries. Les bactéries vivent alors que le sol n'est pas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O solo no dedal contem aproximadamente milhão 
bactérias. As bactérias estão vivendo quando o solo não for.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il terreno nel ditale contiene circa milione 
batteri. I batteri stanno vivendo mentre il terreno non è.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το χώμα στη δακτυλήθρα περιέχει για εκατομμύριο 
βακτηρίδια. Τα βακτηρίδια ζουν ενώ το χώμα δεν είναι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El suelo en el dedal contiene alrededor de 
millón de bacterias. Las bacterias están viviendo mientras que
no es el suelo.</string>
          </description>
